name: Amplified Sleek Cannon
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Dynamic Gas Redistribution Valves drops in Alien Playfields and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Dynamic Gas Redistribution Valves" "257962" #L "Excellent Sleek Cannon" "160162" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Dynamic Gas Redistribution Valves + Excellent Sleek Cannon = #L "Amplified Sleek Cannon" "257126"
